title: iPad Pro gets premium protection with Nomadâ€™s new Modern Leather Folio and Case
content:
Nomad is out today with its latest Apple accessories, this time it’s sharp protection for the iPad Pro. The new Modern Leather Case and Modern Leather Folio for iPad Pro offer an upgrade over Apple’s silicone protection without being bulky.

more…

The post iPad Pro gets premium protection with Nomad’s new Modern Leather Folio and Case appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Nomad is out with new protection for the iPad Pro with the Modern Leather Folio and Modern Case that offer a sharp and seamless design.
